description: Bootstrap collapse.js v3.2.0 JavaScript plugin for collapsible UI components, defining the Collapse class with methods for show, hide, toggle, and event handling.

classes.name: Collapse
classes.description: Class implementing collapse behavior with methods for show, hide, toggle, and managing transition states.

methods.name: dimension
methods.description: Returns the dimension ('width' or 'height') used for collapsing based on element's classes.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Expands the collapsible element with transition effects.

methods.name: hide
methods.description: Collapses the element with transition effects.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles between show and hide states.
